name: Desktop Garage Kit
description:
Desktop Garage Kit

Desktop Garage Kit is an ultra-cute and loveable desktop software. It features a new next-generation 3D cartoon rendering engine, making the desktop characters more delicate and realistic, breaking through dimensional barriers. And it has rich interactive action modules and a brand new massive character update, clothing can be changed, lively and cute. The brand-new physics engine presents a more realistic movement, supports acting cute, coy, cute, and healing, and has more actions, interactions, and mysterious modes for you to unlock. It can always be kept on top of all other windows, always accompanying you, looking forward to your opening.

Features

▪ 370+ pieces of underwear can be switched at will, showing 3D figurine charming posture and style.

▪ The new next-generation 2D cartoon rendering engine makes the characters more delicate and realistic.
▪ Rich figurine model library, constantly updating.
▪ Brand new physics engine, character image, clothing, and hair support physics motion calculation, presenting more realistic movement.
▪ 168+ 3D posture libraries and 48+ 3D action sets included, making the characters more lively and cute.
▪ Mysterious mode button, adding more interesting gameplay.
▪ Particle rendering mode, lighter and shadow special effects presented.
